languages.text: В Империуме вести из Простора встретили с тревогой. Зазвучали речи о карательном походе, но столь же быстро смолкли, а сквозь Великий Разлом прорвался одинокий корабль, доставивший на Даргонус скрепленное печатью Инквизиции письмо. Что было сказано в нем, и кем был его автор... Незнание сего есть благо.

The news from the Expanse was met with deep concern in the Imperium. Some began speaking of a punitive campaign, though they quickly fell silent. A lone ship broke through the Great Rift, carrying a letter to Dargonus bearing the Inquisition's seal. But what the letter contained, and who penned it... is better left unknown.
languages.original_text: В Империуме вести из Простора встретили с тревогой. Зазвучали речи о карательном походе, но столь же быстро смолкли, а сквозь Великий Разлом прорвался одинокий корабль, доставивший на Даргонус скрепленное печатью Инквизиции письмо. Что было сказано в нем, и кем был его автор... Незнание сего есть благо.

traits.locale_text: The news from the Expanse was met with deep concern in the Imperium. Some voices started speaking of a punitive campaign, though they fell silent surprisingly quickly. One single ship broke through the Great Rift, carrying a letter with the Inquisition's seal, bringing it to Dargonus. What was written in this letter, and by whom... blessed are those who stay ignorant of this.

One single ship broke through the Great Rift, carrying a letter with the Inquisition's seal, bringing it to Dargonus. What was written in this letter, and by whom... blessed are those who stay ignorant of this.

A lone ship broke through the Great Rift, carrying a letter to Dargonus bearing the Inquisition's seal. But what the letter contained, and who penned it... Is better left unknown.

A lone ship broke through the Great Rift, carrying a letter to Dargonus bearing the Inquisition's seal. But what the letter contained, and who penned it... Is better left unknown.

A lone ship broke through the Great Rift, carrying a letter to Dargonus bearing the Inquisition's seal. But what the letter contained, and who penned it... is better left unknown.

The news from the Expanse was met with deep concern in the Imperium. Some began speaking of a punitive campaign, though they quickly fell silent. A lone ship broke through the Great Rift, carrying a letter to Dargonus bearing the Inquisition's seal. But what the letter contained, and who penned it... is better left unknown.

languages.text: 来自科罗努斯扩区的消息很快引起了帝国的密切关注。一开始，有人说要对这样的情况采取惩戒行动，但他们很快就沉默了。一艘孤船穿过了大裂隙，将一封带有审判庭印章的信送到了达戈努斯。至于信里写了什么，又是谁写的……还是不要知道为好。
languages.original_text: The news from the Expanse was met with deep concern in the Imperium. Some began speaking of a punitive campaign, though they quickly fell silent. A lone ship broke through the Great Rift, carrying a letter to Dargonus bearing the Inquisition's seal. But what the letter contained, and who penned it... is better left unknown.

traits.locale_text: 来自科罗努斯扩区的消息很快引起了帝国的密切关注。一开始，有人说要对这样的情况采取惩戒行动，但他们很快就沉默了。一艘孤船穿过了大裂隙，将一封带有审判庭印章的信送到了达戈努斯。至于信里写了什么，又是谁写的……还是不要知道为好。

languages.text: Die Nachricht aus der Ausdehnung wurde im Imperium mit großer Sorge aufgenommen. Einige Stimmen sprachen von einem Straffeldzug, doch diese Stimmen verstummten schnell wieder. Ein einsames Schiff durchbrach den Großen Riss. Es brachte einen Brief mit dem Siegel der Inquisition nach Dargonus. Was der Brief jedoch enthielt und wer ihn verfasst hat ... das bleibt besser unbekannt.
languages.original_text: The news from the Expanse was met with deep concern in the Imperium. Some began speaking of a punitive campaign, though they quickly fell silent. A lone ship broke through the Great Rift, carrying a letter to Dargonus bearing the Inquisition's seal. But what the letter contained, and who penned it... is better left unknown.

traits.locale_text: Die Nachricht aus der Ausdehnung wurde im Imperium mit großer Sorge aufgenommen. Einige Stimmen sprachen von einem Straffeldzug, verstummten aber schnell wieder. Ein einsames Schiff durchbrach den Großen Riss. Es brachte einen Brief mit dem Siegel der Inquisition nach Dargonus. Was der Brief jedoch enthielt und wer ihn verfasst hat ... das bleibt besser unbekannt.

languages.text: Les nouvelles venant des Étendues furent reçues avec une profonde inquiétude dans l'Imperium. Les rumeurs d'une campagne punitive se répandirent, mais furent rapidement étouffées. Plus tard, un vaisseau solitaire franchit la Grande Faille pour apporter à Dargonus une lettre arborant le sceau de l'Inquisition. Quant à son contenu et son auteur... mieux vaut qu'ils restent inconnus.
languages.original_text: The news from the Expanse was met with deep concern in the Imperium. Some began speaking of a punitive campaign, though they quickly fell silent. A lone ship broke through the Great Rift, carrying a letter to Dargonus bearing the Inquisition's seal. But what the letter contained, and who penned it... is better left unknown.

traits.locale_text: Les nouvelles venant des Étendues furent reçues avec une profonde inquiétude dans l'Imperium. Les rumeurs d'une campagne punitive se répandirent, mais furent rapidement étouffées. Plus tard, un vaisseau solitaire franchit la Grande Faille pour apporter à Dargonus une lettre arborant le sceau de l'Inquisition Quant à son contenu et son auteur... mieux vaut qu'ils restent inconnus.

languages.text: Las noticias de la Extensión se recibieron con gran preocupación en el Imperium. Se empezó a hablar de realizar una campaña de castigo, aunque pronto se abandonó la idea. Una única nave atravesó la Gran Fisura para llevar una carta con el sello de la Inquisición a Dargonus. En cuanto al contenido de la carta y la identidad de su escritor... es mejor no mencionarlos.
languages.original_text: The news from the Expanse was met with deep concern in the Imperium. Some began speaking of a punitive campaign, though they quickly fell silent. A lone ship broke through the Great Rift, carrying a letter to Dargonus bearing the Inquisition's seal. But what the letter contained, and who penned it... is better left unknown.

traits.locale_text: Las noticias de la Extensión se recibieron con gran preocupación en el Imperium. Se empezó a hablar de realizar una campaña de castigo, aunque pronto se abandonó la idea. Una única nave atravesó la Gran Fisura para llevar una carta con el sello de la Inquisición a Dargonus. En cuanto al contenido de la carta y la identidad de su escritor... es mejor no mencionarlos.

languages.text: エクスパンスからのニュースは、帝国に深い懸念を抱かせた。懲罰的な軍事遠征を行うという声も上がったが、すぐに静まり返った。異端審問庁の印が押されたダルゴナス宛ての手紙を載せた一隻の船が大亀裂を突破したのだ。しかし、その手紙に何が書かれていたのか、誰が書いたのか…これは不明なままにしておくのがよいだろう。
languages.original_text: The news from the Expanse was met with deep concern in the Imperium. Some began speaking of a punitive campaign, though they quickly fell silent. A lone ship broke through the Great Rift, carrying a letter to Dargonus bearing the Inquisition's seal. But what the letter contained, and who penned it... is better left unknown.

traits.locale_text: エクスパンスからのニュースは、帝国に深い懸念を抱かせた。懲罰的な軍事遠征を行うという声も上がったが、すぐに静まり返った。異端審問庁の印が押されたダルゴナス宛ての手紙を載せた一隻の船が大亀裂を突破したのだ。しかし、その手紙に何が書かれていたのか、誰が書いたのか…これは不明なままにしておくのがよいだろう。

languages.text: Enginlik'ten gelen haberler, İmparatorluk'ta derin endişeyle karşılandı. Kimileri cezai sefer düzenlenebileceğinden söz etmeye başlasa da çok geçmeden bu sesler kesildi. Kendi başına Büyük Yarık'ı aşan bir gemi, Engizisyon'un mührünü taşıyan bir mektubu Dargonus'a ulaştırdı. Bu mektubun içeriği ve kimin yazdığı ise... Bilinmese daha iyi.
languages.original_text: The news from the Expanse was met with deep concern in the Imperium. Some began speaking of a punitive campaign, though they quickly fell silent. A lone ship broke through the Great Rift, carrying a letter to Dargonus bearing the Inquisition's seal. But what the letter contained, and who penned it... is better left unknown.

traits.locale_text: Enginlik'ten gelen haberler, İmparatorluk'ta derin endişeyle karşılandı. Bazıları ceza amaçlı bir sefer düzenlenmesinden bahsetmeye başladı ancak çok geçmeden bu sesler kesildi. Kendi başına Büyük Yarık'ı aşan bir gemi, Dargonus'a, Engizisyon'un mührünü taşıyan bir mektup ulaştırdı. Bu mektubun ne içerdiği ve kim tarafından yazıldığı ise... Bilinmese daha iyi.
